svt_axi_ace_master_load_barrier_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_ace_master_load_barrier_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This sequence does the following: Send a number of transactions to load . The number of transactions sent is based on num_pre_barrier_loads. Send a barrier pair Send a post barrier transaction that is associated to the barrier pair. This transaction will be send out only after the response to the barrier pair is received When the post barrier transaction ends, check that all pre barrier transactions have also ended.

Member Constraint Documentation

  constraint
 svt_axi_ace_master_load_barrier_sequence::reasonable_num_observers

constraint reasonable_num_observers {
    num_ports inside {[1:(ace_ports.size()+ace_lite_ports.size()-1)]};
  }

  constraint
 svt_axi_ace_master_load_barrier_sequence::reasonable_num_pre_barrier_xacts

Greater weightage for sending only one pre barrier xact because there is a greater possibility of things going wrong there
constraint reasonable_num_pre_barrier_xacts {
    num_pre_barrier_loads dist {
      1 := 50,[2:10] := 50
    };
  }

  constraint
 svt_axi_ace_master_load_barrier_sequence::valid_domain_type

constraint valid_domain_type {
    domain_type inside {svt_axi_transaction::INNERSHAREABLE,
                        svt_axi_transaction::OUTERSHAREABLE,
                        svt_axi_transaction::NONSHAREABLE};
  }
